alert.note: Alert for Leon; Robertson (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 22 at 7:32PM CST until further notice by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Texas... Cowleech Fork Sabine River At Greenville affecting Hunt County. Navasota River Near Easterly affecting Leon and Robertson Counties. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Texas... South Fork Sabine River Near Quinlan affecting Hunt and Rockwall Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Navasota River near Easterly. * WHEN...From Wednesday afternoon until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 23.0 feet, Moderate lowland flooding below Easterly is expected. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:00 PM CST Monday the stage was 6.9 feet. - Bankfull stage is 17.0 feet. - Flood stage is 19.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage Wednesday afternoon and continue rising to 21.3 feet early Thursday morning. Additional rises are possible thereafter. &&
info.instruction: Do not drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/fwd.
